duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain a pipeline of warm leads to ensure consistent client outreach and engagement.
Educate clients on the company's value-based leads program and assist them in finding the best support and product for their needs.
Work with A-rated life insurance carriers and leverage advanced technology to provide comprehensive training and ongoing support to clients.
Achieve competitive commission levels and qualify for bonus programs by meeting targets and exceeding expectations.
Promote all expense-paid vacations and medical, dental, and life insurance benefits to eligible clients.
